items.title: Indian fintech Jar turns profitable by enabling millions to save in gold
items.excerpt: Jar , an Indian fintech startup that allows users to invest in gold, has turned profitable by helping millions of first-time savers use its app to build digital gold holdings.

items.title: Numeral raises $35M to automate sales tax with AI
items.excerpt: Sam Ross, the co-founder and CEO of Numeral , came up with the idea for his sales tax compliance startup while traveling the world after having worked as a product manager at Airbnb.

items.title: Nvidia AI chip challenger Groq raises even more than expected, hits $6.9B valuation
items.excerpt: AI chip startup Groq confirmed Wednesday that it raised a fresh $750 million in funding at a post-money valuation of $6.9 billion.

items.title: Kleiner Perkins-backed voice AI startup Keplar aims to replace traditional market research
items.excerpt: For decades, Fortune 500 companies had to hire market research firms to get meaningful insights into customer satisfaction. These services come with a hefty price tag and often take weeks to complete.
